summary: This document is an email chain between an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and a person named Holland, scheduling a follow-up call to discuss 'NM-related Epstein matters.' The communication is professional and non-urgent, indicating ongoing coordination in the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: Holland
persons.context: The person who sent an email on Saturday, August 17, 2019, proposing times for a follow-up call regarding 'NM-related Epstein matters' and wishing good luck on a trial.

events.title: Trial Start Date
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney mentions having a trial starting on this date, which will make them mostly unavailable the preceding week.

keyFacts: The email chain is a scheduling communication regarding a follow-up call about 'NM-related Epstein matters.'
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is involved in the correspondence.
The communication indicates ongoing, non-urgent coordination in the Epstein investigation as of August 2019.
